subject: Clutch part malfunction
description_text:
This part from my clutch broke and I need a replacement. I've only had the
pedals for around 3 months and it broke from normal use. Is it possible to
have the replacement part shipped to me?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jesse Stiglet,  Okay, this may have been caused by uneven force. We will improve this in our design. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and we will send you a replacement.

Order placed
September 3, 2025
Order #
111-9183965-9204213

On Amazon


Jesse Stiglet

Phone: 813-758-6748

Address: 8100 W Hwy 98 Apt 214, Pensacola, FL 32506

Thank you for your help

On Sun, Dec 28, 2025, 7:47 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Jesse Stiglet,     OK, WE WILL SHIP IT ASAP.

Awesome, thank you so much!

On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 4:07 AM support@simsonn.com

Was this ever shipped? I haven't received anything


On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 4:07 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Jesse Stiglet,  Here is your new tracking number: SF6047237304789.   the shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
